Cairo. This, Donald Rumsfeld said, has proven to be "confusing." "It certainly doesn't give one confidence," the former secretary said of the administration's public steps. One doesn't know precisely what's taking place with private diplomacy-- what's really most effective-- but certainly the public diplomacy has been somewhat confusing. Donald Rumsfeld , who has known Hosni Mubarak for decades, responded carefully when asked whether he is a dictator.

Chairman and CEO Eric Schmidt too issue with the assertion that Google Inc. and its competitors such as Apple were involved in a some sort of blood sport, saying people assume that these are zero-sum games, which are battles to the death. Eric Schmidt instead proposed that the market was big enough for multiple approaches, saying "there's plenty of room for everyone." techplanet30.com In this video I talk about Google Inc. and would like to know your thoughts on

Downing Street's indication that Andy Coulson will not be receiving severance pay is in line with the standard contract for special advisers, it said. The contract, drawn up in June, reads: Because of the power of the Crown to dismiss at will, you are not entitled to a period of notice terminating your employment. However, unless your employment is terminated by agreement, results from... disciplinary proceedings, inefficiency or grounds justifying summary dismissal at common law, you will in practice normally be given not less than three months' notice in writing terminating your employment. On the expiration of such notice, your employment will terminate. 66% of ComRes respondents thought PM should not have hired Andy Coulson knowing he had resigned as NoW editor over phone-hacking scandal.
